title: Fio and create source folder
description: Install fio package and others if required on Linux using the apt-get utility.

packages.description: The packages to install too on the VM.

update.description: Run apt-get update prior to running the full install command. Allowed values are 'true' and 'false'. Note that no additional options are passed to the 'apt-get update' command other than --quiet --assume-yes. It is recommended for you to set this to true and run update.

options.description: Any additional options to pass to the apt-get command line. These options will precede the install command when executed. Please see http://manpages.debian.org/cgi-bin/man.cgi?query=apt-get for an in-depth look at the options available. Note that --assume-yes and --quiet are always passed automatically.

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('apt-get update && apt-get -y install fio ' , parameters('packages'), ' && mkdir -p /opt/sources/', parameters('sourcedir1'))]
